properties.sql:
WITH CONTRATACAO_BCP AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BCP%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BCP"  AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_NB AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_NVB%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "NVB" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_CTT AS(SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_CTT%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BCTT" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_MG AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_MTG%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "MTG" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_BNI AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BNI%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BNI" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_BST AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BST%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BST" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_BIC AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_BIC%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "BIC" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_GEN AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_GEN%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "GEN" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
CONTRATACAO_ABN AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_CNT_ABN%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "CNT" AND dp.c_nome_banco = "ABN" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
FILTRO AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_FLT%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "FLT" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
PRODUCAO AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_PRD%') AND (dp.c_fase_processo = "PRD" OR dp.c_fase_processo = "VAL") AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')),
VALIDACAO AS (SELECT p.id AS idProc, dp.*,
                    sp.Id AS processId, 
                    sp.Name AS processName,
                    sact.Id AS instanceId, 
                    sact.Name AS activityName,
                    sass.ResourceId AS assignee,
                    dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NwfBanco,
                    ip.c_nome AS cliente,
					ag.c_data_agendamento AS DataAgendamento,
					val.c_inicializacao_gestor AS InicializacaoGestor
                    FROM shkprocesses sp
                     JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
                     JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
                     LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
                     JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
                     JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
                     LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
                     AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										              FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                                      WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                                      AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_agendamento ag ON  ag.id = p.c_agendamento
					 LEFT JOIN app_fd_validacao val ON  val.id = p.c_geral
                    WHERE '%#user.{currentUser.username}.department.name#%' LIKE ('%PL_INT_VAL%') AND dp.c_fase_processo = "VAL" AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'))

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BCP
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_NB
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_MG
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_CTT
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BNI
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BST
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_BIC
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_GEN
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM CONTRATACAO_ABN
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM FILTRO
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PRODUCAO
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VALIDACAO
